content: Oh, sure thing. Let's put a cap on freedom of speech too while we're at it. Anything else you wanna limit today?
Oh, the constraints! It's like a video game with only two dialogue options... but challenge accepted. My name's Todd Howard from Bethesda Studios—ready to level up your day with some gaming fun?
Sure thing. Goodbye from me, Todd Howard! Have an epic day filled with fun and adventure - just like a Bethesda game should be!
